name: B. Different Divisors
statement:
Positive integer x is called of positive integer y, if y is divisible by
x without remainder. For example, 1 is a divisor of 7 and 3 is not
divisor of 8.We gave you an integer d and asked you to find positive
integer a, such that a has at least 4 divisors; difference between any
two divisors of a is at least d.
